Writing data options

Writing data options

Examples

# write to disk
(x <- HttpClient$new(url = "https://httpbin.org"))
#> <crul connection> 
#>   url: https://httpbin.org
#>   curl options: 
#>   proxies: 
#>   auth: 
#>   headers: 
f <- tempfile()
res <- x$get("get", disk = f)
res$content # when using write to disk, content is a path
#> [1] "/var/folders/fc/n7g_vrvn0sx_st0p8lxb3ts40000gn/T//RtmpWRHsLK/file142b213e1f10d"
readLines(res$content)
#>  [1] "{"                                                                     
#>  [2] "  \"args\": {}, "                                                      
#>  [3] "  \"headers\": {"                                                      
#>  [4] "    \"Accept\": \"application/json, text/xml, application/xml, */*\", "
#>  [5] "    \"Accept-Encoding\": \"gzip, deflate\", "                          
#>  [6] "    \"Connection\": \"close\", "                                       
#>  [7] "    \"Host\": \"httpbin.org\", "                                       
#>  [8] "    \"User-Agent\": \"libcurl/7.54.0 r-curl/3.1 crul/0.4.1.9112\""     
#>  [9] "  }, "                                                                 
#> [10] "  \"origin\": \"24.21.229.59\", "                                      
#> [11] "  \"url\": \"https://httpbin.org/get\""                                
#> [12] "}"                                                                     

# streaming response
(x <- HttpClient$new(url = "https://httpbin.org"))
#> <crul connection> 
#>   url: https://httpbin.org
#>   curl options: 
#>   proxies: 
#>   auth: 
#>   headers: 
res <- x$get('stream/50', stream = function(x) cat(rawToChar(x)))
#> {"headers": {"Accept-Encoding": "gzip, deflate", "Accept": "application/json, text/xml, application/xml, */*", "Connection": "close", "Host": "httpbin.org", "User-Agent": "libcurl/7.54.0 r-curl/3.1 crul/0.4.1.9112"}, "args": {}, "url": "https://httpbin.org/stream/50", "origin": "24.21.229.59", "id": 0}
